constituent: lot, soil, dirt, ground, grass skirt, top hat, eight, six, animal legs, celery, scarf
heisigStory: Ground . . . grass skirt. The lot of this key word refers to a portion of land.
koohiiStory1: My dream is to buy a small lot on a tropical island and spend the rest of my days relaxing in a grass skirt.
koohiiStory2: On the island of JOU, in order to be considered a lot, a ground must be big enough to grow sufficient grass for a grass skirt.
